alert.note: Alert for Daviess (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 12:08PM EST until March 06 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana...Kentucky... Ohio River at Owensboro. .Recent heavy rainfall will continue to cause rises on the Ohio River into next week. For the Ohio River...including Owensboro...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH SUNDAY, MARCH 06... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Owensboro. * WHEN...Until Sunday, March 06. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:46 AM CST Friday the stage was 39.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 41.0 feet early Wednesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday, March 05. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
